metadata.title: CVE-2024-53008 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inconsistent interpretation of HTTP requests ('HTTP Request/ResponseSmuggling') issue exists in HAProxy. If this vulnerability is exploited,  aremote attacker may access a path that is restricted by ACL (Access ControlList) set on the product. As a result, the attacker may obtain sensitiveinformation.

criterions.comment: haproxy package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
